Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI

package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    ClientGUI
    This class implements visual functions needed by the GUI version of the game to run.
    GoodbyeSceneController
    A scene controller used to communicate with the goodbye scene.
    InitSceneController
    A scene controller used for communicating with the scenes of the login phase.
    JavaFXGUI
    Class that handles the display of windows for the scenes and changes the current scene, it contains different static methods for handling the process
    RematchPhaseSceneController
    A scene controller used to communicate with the EndGame scene
    SceneProxy
    Channel for communication between the ClientGUI and the sceneControllers, implementing Proxy and singleton patterns.
    StartingPhaseSceneController
    A scene controller used for communicating with the scenes of the starting phase
    TurnSceneController
    A scene controller used for communicating with the gameScene
  • Enum Class Summary
    Enum Class
    Description
    SceneName
    Enumeration for the names of the scenes, for every value there should be a fxml file with the same name
